1: I look up and pray to you. Your throne is in heaven.
2: Slaves depend on their masters. A female slave depends on the woman she works for. In the same way, we depend on the Lord our God. We wait for him to have mercy on us.
3: Lord, have mercy on us. Have mercy on us, because people haven't stopped making fun of us.
4: We have had to put up with a lot from those who are proud. They were always laughing at us.
